column4: anyone here good with getting a mail server to work correctly with ubuntu?
i did the tutorial for how to set up a mail server at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MailServer i see the messages in /var/mail/<my username>
but i can't get it to grab those messages into a mail GUI
haha, ok, one more time here..
are u using pop or imap

i did the tutorial for how to set up a mail server at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MailServer i see the messages in /var/mail/<my username>, i installed squirrelmail, and tried using evolution, but i can't get it to grab those messages into a mail GUI
and what errors do u see
i've tried pop3 too, (i didn't restrict which i would use).
well what happens when u try to connect to the mailbox
nothing.. it asks for password.. then nothing gets downloaded
is anything recorded in the logs
and which  did u go with courier, cyrus or dovecot

theres a nice test at http://www.zoneedit.com/smtp.html and it works, yes there are things in the logs, but its not error messages, "Feb 27 19:44:37 weather dovecot: imap-login: Login: user=<username>, method=PLAIN, rip=127.0.0.1, lip=127.0.0.1, TLS"
